Hi folks,

RH8.0
Globus Toolkit 3.2
junit3.8.1
==================

I am prepared intalling Globus Toolkit 3.2 which requires 'junit'  I
have 'junit3.8.1.zip' download to /home/user-admin/Junit/ and unzip
it.


1)
According to Installation instruction;
http://junit.sourceforge.net/README.html#Installation

2. # add junit.jar to the CLASSPATH. For example: set
classpath=%classpath%;INSTALL_DIR\junit3\junit.jar

I assume I have to execute following command on Konsole window (KDE
desktop)

# set classpath=%classpath%;home\user-admin\Junit\junit3.8.1\junit.jar

If I'm wrong please correct me.


2)
re:Notice: 
that the tests are not contained in the junit.jar but in the
installation directory directly. Therefore make sure that the
installation directory is on the class path

How to set "installation directory on the class path"

The test files are in
/home/user-admin/Junit/junit3.8.1/junit/tests

Kindly advise.  TIA

B.R.
satimis
